snippet: Police officers visited tight end Aaron Hernandez’s house in Massachusetts on Tuesday after a body was found Monday in an industrial park about a mile away.
abstract: State and local police officers search North Attleboro, Mass, home of New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez after a dead body is found in an industrial park about a mile from his home; identity of victim and cause of death are not released.
lead_paragraph: Police officers visited tight end Aaron Hernandez’s house in Massachusetts on Tuesday after a body was found Monday in an industrial park about a mile away.

headline.main: Patriot’s Home Searched After Discovery of Body in Park
headline.print_headline: Patriot’s Home Searched After Discovery of Body
